2025-W52.narrative: This week I dove deep into fundamentals â€” from hash maps and stacks to heaps and graphs. I explored how data systems handle storage through LSM trees and B-trees in DDIA, learned about fan-out strategies for Twitter's feed, and discovered that octopuses have three hearts. The brain-neuron-star connection blew my mind.

topics.name: arrays & hashing
topics.preview: Hash maps for O(1) lookups, two-pass patterns

items.name: Two Sum
items.insight: Hash map for O(n) lookup. Classic pattern: complement = target - num

items.name: Valid Parentheses
items.insight: Stack pattern. Push opening, pop and match for closing

items.name: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
items.insight: Track min price so far, max profit = current - min

items.name: Contains Duplicate
items.insight: Set for O(1) lookup. Return true if len(set) != len(array)

items.name: Product of Array Except Self
items.insight: Two passes: left products then right products. Avoid division.

items.name: Maximum Subarray
items.insight: Kadane's algorithm: max(num, currentMax + num). Reset when sum goes negative.

items.name: 3Sum
items.insight: Sort first, then two pointers. Skip duplicates to avoid repeated triplets.

topics.name: linked lists
topics.preview: Floyd's cycle detection, dummy heads, heap for merge k

items.name: Merge Two Sorted Lists
items.insight: Dummy head trick. Compare and advance pointers.

items.name: Linked List Cycle
items.insight: Floyd's tortoise and hare. Fast catches slow if cycle exists.

items.name: Reverse Linked List
items.insight: Three pointers: prev, curr, next. Iterative is cleaner than recursive.

items.name: Merge k Sorted Lists
items.insight: Min heap of list heads. Pop smallest, push its next. O(N log k).

items.name: LRU Cache
items.insight: HashMap + doubly linked list. O(1) get and put.

topics.name: trees
topics.preview: BFS level order, BST validation, LCA pattern

items.name: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
items.insight: BFS with queue. Track level size to separate levels.

items.name: Validate Binary Search Tree
items.insight: Pass min/max bounds down. Or do inorder and check sorted.

items.name: Lowest Common Ancestor
items.insight: Post-order: if both sides return non-null, current is LCA.

topics.name: graphs
topics.preview: DFS flood fill, topological sort with cycle detection

items.name: Number of Islands
items.insight: DFS flood fill. Mark visited by changing to '0'. Count DFS calls.

items.name: Course Schedule
items.insight: Topological sort with cycle detection. Three colors: unvisited, visiting, visited.

topics.name: Twitter Feed
topics.preview: Fan-out on write vs read, celebrity handling

items.name: Twitter Feed
items.insight: Fan-out on write vs fan-out on read. Celebrities are special case - hybrid approach.

topics.name: Rate Limiter
topics.preview: Token bucket vs sliding window algorithms

items.name: Rate Limiter
items.insight: Token bucket vs sliding window. Trade-offs: memory vs accuracy.

items.name: URL Shortener
items.insight: Base62 encoding, consistent hashing for distribution. Read-heavy: cache aggressively.

topics.name: DDIA
topics.preview: Data models, storage engines, encoding formats

items.insight: Reliability, scalability, maintainability. The three pillars of data systems.
Data models: relational vs document vs graph. Each has trade-offs.
Storage engines: LSM trees vs B-trees. Log-structured vs page-oriented.
Indexing strategies. B-tree for range queries, hash for point lookups.
Encoding formats: JSON, Thrift, Protobuf. Schema evolution and compatibility.
LLM fundamentals: tokens, context windows, temperature. Foundation for everything else.
Prompt engineering patterns: few-shot, chain of thought, self-consistency.

items.content: The human brain has about 86 billion neurons, roughly the same number as stars in the Milky Way
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood. Two hearts pump blood to gills, one to the body.
A day on Venus is longer than its year. It takes 243 Earth days to rotate but only 225 to orbit the Sun.

topics.name: Portfolio & Journal
topics.preview: Dark mode, mobile responsive, sync pipeline

items.work: Added dark mode toggle and improved mobile responsiveness
Set up Python sync script to extract data from Google Docs
